mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (username, password, salt, create_time, last_modified) VALUES (#{user.username}, #{user.password}, #{user.salt}, #{user.createTime}, #{user.lastModified})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, username, password, salt FROM user WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT role_name FROM role JOIN user_role ON role.role_id = user_role.role_id JOIN user ON user_role.user_id = user.user_id WHERE user.username = #{username}

SELECT permission FROM permission JOIN role_permission ON permission.permission_id = role_permission.permission_id JOIN role ON role_permission.role_id = role.role_id WHERE role.role_name = #{roleName}
